Welcome.nopassword: No Password Has Been Set For The Wallet. Please Create A Password First.
Welcome.create: Begin by creating a new wallet
Welcome.subtitle_message: Verto is your gateway into Volentix.

CreateVertoPassword.important_warning_read: Verto does not store your password.
CreateVertoPassword.important_warning_lose_pass: I understand my password cannot be recovered.
CreateVertoPassword.fillall: Please fill all the fields above
CreateVertoPassword.onlysupport: For now, Verto only supports the ability to add public keys. To add a wallet, simply provide a name, the wallet address, and the Verto password.
CreateVertoPassword.createkey: Create public/private key pairs for a new wallet. Note that ONLY the public key is stored in Verto. You are responsible for the management of your own private key, its storage, and security.
CreateVertoPassword.choose: Choose to open a wallet by simply clicking on its name.
CreateVertoPassword.note: NOTE: Verto is unable to recover deleted wallets.
CreateVertoPassword.file_location:
Your private key was saved to "internal storage" or "emulated storage" in the Download folder. 

 File Path: {location}
CreateVertoPassword.failed_to_create_wallet: There was an error saving your wallet's private keys
CreateVertoPassword.pick_private_key_location_desc: Please select a location for your private keys.

WalletManager.used: The name or the wallet has already been used.
WalletManager.both: You must supply both a name and the public key for the wallet.
WalletManager.cannotrecover: Verto cannot recover the wallet once deleted. Press the delete button again for final deletion.

KeepYourKeysSafe.before: Before continuing, it is important to note that you are entirely responsible for the management, safety, protection, and recovery of your private key. No one else including partners of the Volentix ecosystem.
KeepYourKeysSafe.choices: You have 2 choices on persisting your private key. Both methods are designed to ensure your private key remains safe.
KeepYourKeysSafe.second: Or, encrypt your key in a password protected file.

SaveYourKeys.strategy: Plan a strategy for the physical storage of your private key. This storage strategy should include long term thinking, including:
SaveYourKeys.physical: Physical Security: Vaults of any kind that provide the protection you are seeking. Think of somewhere you know is safe from theft as well as the elements. some examples are a home or bank safe, or lawyer. you may choose to protect your keys by storing copies in multiple places.
SaveYourKeys.legacy: Legacy: Things happen. Life ends. You need to plan for the transference of your wallet to someone else. In some cases that may be a will, please consider your options carefully. The choice is yours.
SaveYourKeys.responsible: I am entirely responsible for the security managment of my private key
SaveYourKeys.access: I understand that Volentix and/or partners never have access to my private key
SaveYourKeys.wifi: I understand WIFI will be disabled temporarily during the generation of keys
SaveYourKeys.done_writing_key: I am done viewing the private key
SaveYourKeys.done: I am done writing my key down
SaveYourKeys.choose_password_for_keys: Choose a password for the private key

DisplayKey.understand: I understand that the private key is not stored in Verto and cannot be recovered.
DisplayKey.already: The name or the key has already been used.
DisplayKey.mustname: You must provide a name for your key.
DisplayKey.goodpen: Use a good pen that will not smudge or fade over time.
DisplayKey.goodpaper: Use good paper that will last.
DisplayKey.polaroid: If you want to take a photo, use a non-digital platform such as 35mm or Polaroid.
DisplayKey.look: Look for a warm, safe, secure, dry place such as a bank safety deposit box.
DisplayKey.provisions: Add provisions to your will on who and how the transfer of your wallet will be conducted.
DisplayKey.picture: Take a picture with your cell phone.
DisplayKey.name_is_used: This wallet name is already used
DisplayKey.address_is_used: This wallet address is already used

Main.mainNetDownMessage: We have tried the following addresses on the network, however, we are not able to get a response at this time. Check your Internet connection and try again.

SettingsView.file_chooser: Choose File with + sign then Upload with cloud icon.

AssociateView.update: Update Verto Configuration With This Association

ChangeVertoPassword.recommended: It is recommended that you first backup the current configuration of Verto before changing the password. You can back up Verto
ChangeVertoPassword.access: Changes the password to access Verto. Once selected, all configuration is encrypted using the new password.

BackupWallet.simple: Simple tooling to back up your wallet in order to restore or open on another device. Simply
BackupWallet.directory: Select a directory to back up the wallet to.
BackupWallet.willbackup: Verto will back up the wallet with the name 'verto' + the date + '.config'

ChoosePassword.storeext: Store on an external drive, wallet, or USB key.
ChoosePassword.storeloc: Store it on your computers local drive.

RequestNativeChainAddress.err_noAddressAvailable: No address available for that chain. Please try again later.
RequestNativeChainAddress.err_investor_must_wait: You must wait an hour between before requesting a new address.
RequestNativeChainAddress.second_p: The address you receive is only valid for a limited period of time.
RequestNativeChainAddress.second_p_point_1: Any transaction you send after the allocation period may be lost.
RequestNativeChainAddress.third_p: You are only able to request one native chain address per hour.
RequestNativeChainAddress.time_remaining_info: You must wait one hour between Native Chain address requests

NotWhitelisted.kyc_1: To get VTX, investors must KYC (Know Your Customer) with one of our trusted partners. This process is to ensure we remain in complience with regulators in your region. Note that this process must only be completed once before being accepted as a potential contributor. Note that this selection will associate this wallet with your KYC application.
NotWhitelisted.second_p: If you have already KYC'd, however, have not associated this wallet with your account, please log into the KYC provider to do so. This step is required before you are able to get VTX. Note that if you KYC'd within the wallet you will not be required to do this step.
NotWhitelisted.assign_verto_to_venue_desc: If you are a member of Venue, you will need to associate a wallet in order to claim your VTX. Note that you will also need to complete the KYC process. Once both actions are complete, your VTX will be allocated to this wallet.

KycAlreadyAssociated.first_p: The KYC'd account has already been allocated a Verto Public Address.

BeginGetVtx.investor_must_wait: You are only allowed one buying session per hour. Please wait and try again.
BeginGetVtx.wallet_not_whitelisted: The current wallet is not white listed.
BeginGetVtx.current_phase_not_active: The current buying phase has not started and is not active yet.
BeginGetVtx.address_allocation_suspended: This crowdfund has been suspended but will resume soon.
BeginGetVtx.crowdfund_over: The current croudfund is over. But there are more phases to come.
BeginGetVtx.approval: Please be patient. We will approve you shortly.

VenueAssignAddress.important_info: Your Venue Credentials are not stored by Verto.
VenueAssignAddress.email_verification_required: You must first verify your email with Venue before associating the wallet.
VenueAssignAddress.verto_address_not_unique: The address is already assigned to another user.
VenueAssignAddress.user_deactivated: This user is no longer active.

NotApprovedForPurchase.patience: Please be patient. We are slowly throttling the people who available to Get Vtx.
NotApprovedForPurchase.approved: Once approved, you will see a message in Verto informing you that you are now able to Get VTX.
